headDetails.description: Gabrielgsd: Content creation, programming, avatar and VRChat world editing. Expertise in development, design and editing. Innovative projects and user feedback.
headDetails.ogDescription: Hi! I'm Gabrielgsd, a junior programmer, avatar and VRChat world editor. If you want to know more about me or what I do, check out my portfolio.

hero.description: Developer passionate about automating repetitive tasks and building practical tools aimed at communities

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Gabrielgsd, a junior developer specialized in backend development and mobile applications. I'm passionate about creating tools that simplify processes, optimize tasks and add value to tech communities. I enjoy learning new technologies and facing challenges that allow me to grow professionally while contributing to projects with real impact.

cards.title: My motivation
cards.description: I am driven by a constant desire to learn and acquire new knowledge. I enjoy every opportunity for growth and I am passionate about applying what I learn to help others and create useful solutions.

cards.title: More about me
cards.description: Explore additional information about my education and hobbies.

knowledge.title: My skills
knowledge.description: Here I list my knowledge in programming languages and software that I use or that I am learning.

knowledge.name: NodeJS
knowledge.description: Server-side application development, such as Discord bots and dynamic, scalable websites.

knowledge.name: JavaScript
knowledge.description: Web programming including the development of interactive interfaces and backend logic for full applications.

knowledge.name: HTML5
knowledge.description: Creation of semantic web structures, including advanced use of forms and multimedia to build accessible and functional websites.

knowledge.name: Tailwindcss
knowledge.description: Web design using a utility-first approach, applying styles directly in HTML to achieve clean, modern interfaces.

knowledge.name: EJS
knowledge.description: Template integration for web applications, facilitating dynamic content generation and view customization in server-side development.

knowledge.name: Python
knowledge.description: Develop solutions in Python for moderately complex problems, focusing on clean and efficient code.

knowledge.name: Java
knowledge.description: Develop Java solutions with a focus on code optimization and implementation of efficient solutions for various needs.

knowledge.name: Unity
knowledge.description: Development of projects involving VR, including creation and animation of 3D models, as well as implementation of textures and sound effects, especially in the context of the VRChat SDK.

knowledge.name: Blender
knowledge.description: 3D modeling, including creation and editing of shape keys (blendshapes) and adapting models for integration into VTubing platforms like VSeeFace.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore some of the most notable projects I've developed.
